# 7.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: System.diagnostics entry in app.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/configuration/7.0/diagnostics-config-section.md): Learn about the .NET 7 breaking change in configuration where the `<section name="system.diagnostics">` entry is no longer allowed in an app.config file.
